channel.title: Loading with jarred clients
channel.description:
I have my client successfully jarred, but I've been trying to figure out why I cannot get my class51 to load up (contains awt etc.), instead, my Frame_Sub1 loads. How can I get my client to load up my menubar etc. I am thinking it has something to do with applet_sub1, but I'm not sure.
Note: I have already tried making a batch file that is: [code]@echo off title Matt's Client java -Xmx500m -jar noob.jar Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
Pictures for those of you who have no clue, but may be able to help:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/1976/titsev9.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Loading with jarred clients
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

I have my client successfully jarred, but I’ve been trying to figure out why I cannot get my class51 to load up (contains awt etc.), instead, my Frame_Sub1 loads. How can I get my client to load up my menubar etc. I am thinking it has something to do with applet_sub1, but I’m not sure.

Note: I have already tried making a batch file that is:

@echo off title Matt's Client java -Xmx500m -jar noob.jar Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 pause

Pictures for those of you who have no clue, but may be able to help:
